newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: Yield 14.99 pct at 179-day Lithuania bill sale.
newsitem.headline: Yield 14.99 pct at 179-day Lithuania bill sale.

text.p: The average yield at a rare sale of 179-day Lithuanian T-bills was 14.99 percent, the same as the minimum and maximum yields, the central bank said on Wednesday.
This is only the fourth sale of longer maturity paper this year. The last auction of 182-day paper on May 7 saw an average yield of 21.80 percent.
Amounts are in millions of litas.
MATURITY AVG YLD (LAST TIME) MIN/MAX ISSUE BID
The settlement date for today's auction is August 26 and the bills mature on February 21, 1997.
